definitions.definition: A miserable , dysfunctional state or society that has a very poor standard of living or severe censorship , oppression , etc.
Anatomical tissue that is not found in its usual place.
examples: The patient suffers from adrenal dystopia .

main_definition: A miserable , dysfunctional state or society that has a very poor standard of living or severe censorship , oppression , etc.
secondary_definitions: ( pathology ) Anatomical tissue that is not found in its usual place.
